description: black and white image of wall with partially shut wooden shutters covering window; birdcage to R of window; tree at L in foreground; printed on tan rag paper; in plastic slip cover

markings: on mount verso: six labels; on mount verso, stamped in black ink: [PERETTI-BRIVA DOTTOR DOMENI CO RICCARDO/ Corao Beccaria 2-TORINO]
signed: belwo image at L, on sheet, in pencil: [La gabbietta]; at R in pencil: [D.R. Peretti-friva]
title: La Gabbietta
